txt.en: You have done much to hinder the Orcs and their vile allies at Atrad-zarakh.\n\nYou should raise a banner of the Haban'akkâ of Thráin at Atrad-zarakh.
Defeated Orcs and goblins at Atrad-zarakh ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Orcs, goblins, bats, and sapper-bomb crates can be found at Atrad-zarakh.\n\nKing Thráin has commanded you to join in the assault at Atrad-zarakh. You should aid the Haban'akkâ of Thráin.
Destroy crates of sapper-bombs at Atrad-zarakh ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Destroyed crates of sapper-bombs at Atrad-zarakh ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Haban'akkâ of Thráin will be victorious!
Upon the slopes of Bundushâthur at Atrad-zarakh, Orcs and goblins prepare sapper-bombs and tend the great-bats of Moria that they might overcome the Haban'akkâ of Thráin at Azanulbizar.
Raise a banner of the Haban'akkâ of Thráin at Atrad-zarakh

'The Haban'akkâ has need of your aid, my friend.

'I have received word that our enemies have again rallied to Atrad-zarakh. If what I have heard is true, the Orcs have begun to tend the bats within the tower once more, and the goblins make ready to wield more of their crude bombs into battle. This cannot be borne!'

'Let our enemies at Atrad-zarakh know the wrath of the Haban'akkâ!'
Defeat Orcs and goblins at Atrad-zarakh ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
